author: cnbc.com
title: Geron: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
MENLO PARK, Calif. (AP) _ Geron Corp. (GERN) on Thursday reported a loss of $7.2 million in its first quarter.
The Menlo Park, California-based company said it had a loss of 4 cents per share.
The drugmaker posted revenue of $318,000 in the period.
In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, the company's shares hit $3.63. A year ago, they were trading at $2.59.
